message.body: Hey do u want pork or turkey for Xmas dinner? N don't tell me whatever
I guess pork since I never get to have it here.
Which kind of DS did you get Jay? 3D or regular or something else? Any game suggestions?
3d. can u get him something kiddie. Like cars or Thomas game or something educationalish.
Do u have a gun license?
You don't need a license in PA.
The boys wanna get u something. What can they get u?
Man. I don't want them wasting their money on me.
Ok we'll their gonna do something. So u might as well tell me something so they don't spend it on something u won't use. Lol. P. s. it's my money so don't
worry bout it.
Ok we'll ur gonna end up with a potatoe powered clock???
Perfect.
Ur a pain in the ass.
I don't know what to suggest to you guys. I haven't really gotten to give it any real thought.
Well walk around ur house n think bout it. U got till tomorrw.
I haven't even gotten home from work this morn and I haven't been feeling to well these days but I'll try. Headed home now.
What u feeling? Run down, pain, or depressed?
I'm not really sure. My hands weren't really working right the other day but there's been some other stuff I've been feeling but don't worry about me right now.
Yeah easier said then done. Love u take care of ur self ur getting old I started falling apart when I turned 33.
Yeah. I severely need health insurance. Hopefully this coming year. I just don't know where to look. It's coming 100% out of my pocket so it's hard.
Yeah that sucks

Sorry yester I couldn't really come up stuff. Its hard cuz I hate asking for stuff. If it's too late that's totally fine, I prefer it But a couple lil things: leather belt (the kind that snap off to change buckles), 4lb sledge, 1 of those square flat breakfast frying pan things, inexpensive hydrologic car jack, 8 track player, a roasting pan big enough for a turkey, a Dremel, table clamps, the thinnest/cheapest/most thermal gloves made from that wet suit material ....as long as its cheap, small folding (work type) hand cart... Phew! THAT WAS TOUGH! Thats a bunch of stuff I can't bring myself to get for myself. ...I'd prefer they didn't get me anything tho but.... I'd really like anything old or that theyd like for me to hang on my wall also. CHEAP!
Ok thanks... Love u

Hey are u awake right now with access to a computer? If not its no biggie at all I can figure it out or go with a gamestop gift cirt but I have some shoes I'm thinking about on my Vans wishlist account that I was possibly looking to pick from for Richie. If so call me. If not its really no sweat.
